title: Major lag with FPS showing 300-500 (lol wtf dont need more then 60) and ping at a steady 37
body: game was stuck in perma slow motion and things would make random jumps while moving this is not my end my computer can run multiple clients of much higher resource games with no lag.

replies.body:
From reading your description of what happens, it is entirely possible that you are experiencing packet loss on your connection.  This would not only explain why you are experiencing the slowness in the game, but why your MS counter doesn't change.  To dig a little deeper into what the root cause could be, make sure to use our [Connection Analyzer Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743).  It should let you know the health of your connection as well as give you steps on how to improve it.

Let me know if you have any further questions!

if that was the case then it would show in tracert testing and connection load testing which i have done and it would effect other games as well since this only happens in LoL it has nothing to do with my connection or system resources.  or i would be fixing those instead of posting...

EDIT: full wipe and fresh install did nothing

I completely get where you are coming from.  However, if this was on the server-end in terms of a root cause, then all 9 other players connecting to the same game server you are would be experiencing the same exact issue.  Since that doesn't seem to be the case, then we need to start looking elsewhere for the root cause.

To confirm however, were you able to run the Connection Analyzer?  You mentioned you've completed the "connection load testing", but I wasn't sure if this was the same as the Analyzer tool itself.  Did the Analyzer tool confirm that your connection is completely fine?  Did it give any other kind of results?

Reply back and let me know!

sigh every time blame the client side connection as if its the only answer i checked the logs from the client ZERO PACKET LOSS its not my connection or every game i have would also lag. and its not even connection related at all i said its FPS as in graphical.

i know for 100% fact its has nothing to do with my connection as i mentioned before that would effect every game i play not only this one.  i even set up a dual boot 2nd install of my windows 7 and installed the required pre-req software and drivers and a fresh LoL and it still happens so it is either a problem in the client having issues with my video card drivers or the most recent drivers for my card are conflicting.

That sounds a bit like MS spikes. Are you by chance using Time Warner? I've seen many people using that isp have issues with high ping and lag issues lately. It's very possible that their services are straining to reach the league servers specifically, which is why you may only see the lag in League.

Yo Dolterius!
While Dartagnan may not be aware/comfortable with saying it, anything over 300 (and maybe lower) FPS causes the game to "lag".
There isn't any connection issue that causes it.

Your graphic's card is just "too" good to run League of Legends.
You need to cap your FPS at 60/80/whatever the cap is up there and things won't jump around anymore!

Hope that helps bud!
